channel.title: [PI]World map
channel.description: When I click on my worldmap, the map comes up just fine, and works just fine. But when I click it, there is this command prompt that also comes up. [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/1zmo2m8.jpg[/img] I know it's something to do with my Batch file..This is what my current batch file looks like that opens the map when you click the 'world map' button: [code]@echo off COLOR 72 cd WorldMap\bin/ java Main[/code] What do I need to put in it, so when the player clicks on the 'world map' button, only the world map comes up, No command prompt with it?

item.title: [PI]World map
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

this is mine

@echo off
C:
cd “Cache\JFrame\WorldMap”
Start javaw -jar WorldMap.jar
exit

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]World map
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

When I click on my worldmap, the map comes up just fine, and works just fine. But when I click it, there is this command prompt that also comes up.

1zmo2m8.jpg1033×547

I know it’s something to do with my Batch file…This is what my current batch file looks like that opens the map when you click the ‘world map’ button:

@echo off COLOR 72 cd WorldMap\bin/ java Main
What do I need to put in it, so when the player clicks on the ‘world map’ button, only the world map comes up, No command prompt with it?

Read full topic
